input.sentences: i found a pretty bird with jet black feathers and some bright red ones on its wings .
then i saw this weird looking flower when i heard a strange sound .
where did it come from ? this bored looking walrus !
he 's just watching these birds in the sky .
i watched with it until they flew out of sight .
output.sentences: The bird was going to eat seeds off of the ground there was a flood.
Fortunately for the bird, the tree's flowers offer nector.
The flood dries up to reveal an envious walrus.
The walrus calls forth his pelican watch-dogs to keep an eye on the black bird.
The pelicans call an army of birds and wage war on the black bird.
